p: Given the association of neurodegenerative diseases with alterations in gut microbiota, the effects of fisetin as neuroprotective agent have been studied in a mice model of Parkinsonâ€™s disease. Fisetin improved motor behavior and protected against dopaminergic neurodegeneration induced by MPTP (1-methyl-4-phenyl-1,2,3,6-tetrahydropyridine). It also increased the abundance of Lachnospiraceae, activity associated with its neuroprotective properties ( Chen et al., 2020).
